column1: '''RiffTrax''' are downloadable audio commentaries in which writer [[wikipedia:Michael J. Nelson
column2: Mike Nelson]] and occasional guests heckle (or "riff") blockbuster movies. The concept was taken from Nelson's earlier sohw, ''[[wikipedia:Mystery Science Theater 3000
column3: Mystery Science Theater 3000]]'', in which old or bad B-movies were heckled. Due to copyright reasons, Nelson's new idea is sold online as a sound file which can be played over the DVD.
